subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Compiling a season-high 29 assists, with 11 by Kyle Lowry, and getting 17 or more points from four players, including 20 from DeMar DeRozan, the Raptors beat the Wizards.
snippet: Compiling a season-high 29 assists, with 11 by Kyle Lowry, and getting 17 or more points from four players, including 20 from DeMar DeRozan, the Raptors beat the Wizards.
